programme.desc: Fiosraíonn Doireann Ní Ghlacáin scéal Bridget Kenny, fidléir as Baile Átha Cliath. (Doireann Ní Ghlacáin uncovers the story of fellow Dublin fiddle player Bridget Kenny.)

programme.title: Glór Tíre - Rogha & Togha
programme.desc: Mike Denver ag canadh cuid de na hamhráin ba mhó aige ar stáitse Ghlór Tíre i sraith 16. (A half hour selection of Mike Denver's best performances from the Glór Tíre stage.)

programme.title: Survivor 46
programme.desc: Níl ach cúigear fágtha le dul tríd go dtí an babhta ceannais. (The remaining five castaways must overcome multiple obstacles in the penultimate immunity challenge.)

programme.title: Fíorscéal
programme.desc: Tugtar léargas ar iompar rúnda ainmhithe éagsúla sa gclár faisnéise seo. (This documentary follows the secrets that shape animals' lives and behaviour.)

programme.title: An Aimsir Láithreach
programme.desc: Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

programme.title: Heartlands
programme.desc: Tá Sharon agus Caoilinn ag deireadh an turais anois ar Abhainn na Sionainne. (Sharon and Caoilinn are coming to the end of their journey on the River Shannon.)

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: Pléann na giúiréithe na mionphointí. An mbeadh Kate in ann fáil réidh leis an gcorp léi féin? (The jurors debate logistics. Could Kate really have disposed of the body by herself?)

programme.title: Bíbeanna
programme.desc: "Chonac Jeaic tar éis a bháis. Bhí sé ansan ar an sófa," a deir duine de na Bíbeanna. ("I saw my husband after he died, he was on that sofa there," recalls one of the Bíbeanna.)
